EmailTemplate.name: Resolved and Closed Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: VinSolutions would like to make sure we are providing excellent customer support!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, As your Support Ticket #{!Case.CaseNumber} is now resolved, VinSolutions would be very grateful if you could complete this survey to make sure we are providing excellent customer support! Please click on the Tell Vin link below to complete the survey.Tell Vin Thanks, Your VinCare Team.
